contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|grub}} '''Grub''' can refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Places== * [[Grub, Appenzell Ausserrhoden]], Switzerland * [[Grub, St. Gallen]], Switzerland * [[Grub am Forst]], a town in the district of Coburg in Bavaria, Germany * [[Grub, Thuringia]], a municipality in the district of Hildburghausen in Thuringia, Germany ==Science and technology== * [[Larva]], especially those of the beetle superfamily Scarabaeoidea * Headless set [[screw]], a British term * [[GNU GRUB]], the GNU project's bootloader software * [[Grub (search engine)]], a distributed search crawler platform ==Other== * [[Garden-Raised Bounty (GRuB)]], an American non-profit organization * [[Grub Street]], the former name of a London street, which became a metonym for hack writers * Grub is also a slang word, referring to food. Example usage: "Why am I editing Wikipedia at this hour? Maybe I should get some grub and go to sleep." ==See also== * [[Grubb]] {{disambig|geo}}
